skills.name: Converting between customary units of weight

explanations.A: I think you have multiplied by 10 but there are 16 ounces in a pound...
explanations.B: I think you have multiplied by 100 but there are 16 ounces in a pound...
explanations.C: This is how many ounces there are in 1 pound...
explanations.D: There are 16 ounces in a pound so to go from pounds to ounces you multiply by 16. 2 x 16 = 32

explanations.A: I think you have used 14 ounces = 1 pound but there are 16 ounces in a pound...
explanations.B: I think you have multiplied by 100 but there are 16 ounces in a pound...
explanations.C: You need to convert the 2 pounds into ounces so multiply the 2 by 16, not the 6...
explanations.D: There are 16 ounces in a pound so in 2 pounds there are 32 ounces. 32 - 6 = 26 so there will be 26 ounces remaining in the bag of flour!

explanations.A: You need to convert the 3 pounds into ounces so multiply the 3 by 16, not the 4...
